attributes.action: Treat school children as children and not pieces of data and to return the education of children to the teaching profession and away from the statisticians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our children attending schools today are treated as bits of data, having to reach this target and that target of attainment. It is time that children were treated as children,and allow the teaching profession to do it's job to teach the children

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
